name: CuboRubo
description:
We were formed in Ukraine in 2015. The experienced team of developers with high education in Software Engineering, successfully implement complex projects. Team leaders have fifteen years of experience in developing and our team of Engineers has technical expertise and experience to create the right solution in accordance with your requirements.
What are we doing: Architecture and integrate database Leading CMS systems or framework Mobile app for Android/iOS UX/UI Design Our technology stack includes: ASP.NET, C#, .NET, AJAX, Node.JS, Java, OOPS, JSON Databases (MongoDB, SQL Server, MySQL, Access) JavaScript, jQuery, AngularJS, backbone.js LAMP, PHP, CakePHP, YII, Bootstrap, Jade, Less WordPress, Drupal, Bitrix, OpenCart Mobile Development: iOS – Objective-C, Swift, Xcode, iOS SDK Android – Java, Android SDK, JavaCore, SWING, Hibernate, Selenium, SQL, SQLite, NoSQL, REST. jQueryMobile, Xamarin
